name: steamini-front
prompt: Pixel-art 64x64 front battle sprite of Steamini, a cute copper-colored steam locomotive train. Round friendly boiler, small smokestack puffing white steam, large headlamp eye, warm copper and brass colors, clean black outline, 16-color palette maximum, retro dithered shading, facing forward toward camera, Game Boy Advance Pokemon battle sprite style, no background, transparent or solid color background.
negative_prompt: photo, realistic, 3d render, blur, extra wheels, incorrect proportions, text, watermark, scenery, tracks, background elements, modern graphics
